appearances.snippet: chairman jim jordan has announced smith will sit publicly before the committee next thursday, januaryd. it comes after smith sat for an eight hour closed door deposition with the same committee last month. that transcript and video was then quietly released on new year's eve. in that deposition, smith, who secured two indictments against donald trump but was forced to drop the cases after trump won the white house, said he and his team had enough evidence to win convictions beyond a reasonable doubt. i will also add it's pretty normal fare on the hill to do a closed door deposition before doing something public like this. so as much as it was clear that the committee wanted to bury that testimony with their very quiet release of the testimony and video, this is now the normal state of affairs, and it's what smith has been pushing for. he wants to tell this story publicly, going to get his chance next week. still ahead for us now we are going to turn to sports and the nfl playoffs. as the steelers and texans wrapped up the wild card round in pittsburgh. get you those highlights straigh
